home.title: noro
home.tagline: share secrets securely. one-time links that self-destruct.

encryption.title: end-to-end encrypted
encryption.description: secrets are encrypted in your browser before transmission. we never see your data.

expiry.title: auto-destruct
expiry.description: links expire after a single view or set time limit. no trace left behind.

zerotrust.title: zero trust
zerotrust.description: decryption keys stay in the url fragment. server only stores encrypted blobs.

claim.confirm: a secret is waiting for you
claim.confirmWarning: once revealed, this secret will be permanently deleted
claim.extensionWarning: for maximum security, use incognito mode
claim.notfound: this secret has expired or already been viewed
claim.notfoundDetail: the link may have expired, been viewed, or never existed
claim.label: label
claim.warning: this secret has been permanently deleted
